infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses the location while recording observations to assess damange and/or to map floods.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses the location while recording observations to assess damange and/or to map floods.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses the location while recording observations to assess damange and/or to map floods.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take pictures for observations made during damage assessment or flood extent mapping.
